short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All-in-one QR tool. Transfer what you're browsing to your phone via QR. Generate and read QRs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Page To Mobile
- Converts your current page into a QR code the moment you click on the extension! Easily download, copy or scan the QR using your mobile camera!

Generate
- Generate QRs using URL or multi-line data. Any kind of data will be converted into QR including JSON. Includes ability to download or copy the QR! Throw it in a word editor of choice or paste to your friends.

Read
- Extract data from QR codes. If the QR has data, it will be extracted. Easy clipboard functionality to copy data. Super convenient for developers!

if you like this extension, please consider leaving a review and rating five stars! Looking forward to your comments!
